name: pySigma 0.8.9
body:
## What's Changed
* Added FieldPrefixMappingTransformation.
* Fix a big here a ConditionItem with multiple items would not have a p… by @Res260 in https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/pull/66

## New Contributors
* @Res260 made their first contribution in https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/pull/66

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/compare/v0.8.8...v0.8.9

name: pySigma 0.8.8
body: * Added custom Sigma rule attributes in `custom_attributes`.

name: pySigma 0.8.7
body: * SigmaString slice with start after end of string now results in empty SigmaString instead of exception. This matches the behavior of Pytho strings.

name: pySigma 0.8.6
body:
* Fix: conversion of rule ids to UUIDs on load of validator configuration from YAML or dict.
* Fix: Added type `tool` to MITRE ATT&CK software tags.

name: pySigma 0.8.5
body: * Improved validator docstrings for displaying in CLI.

name: pySigma 0.8.4
body: * Improved rule error collection for checking of rules.

name: pySigma 0.8.3
body:
* Generalized SigmaValidator.validate_rule_collection method into validate_rules
* Added intrusion sets and malwares to ATT&CK validation

name: pySigma 0.8.2
body:
## What's Changed
* Rule validation framework and validators.
* Fix crash at calling `startswith`/`endswith` on empty strings by @alexott in https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/pull/62

## New Contributors
* @alexott made their first contribution in https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/pull/62

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/compare/v0.8.1...v0.8.2

name: pySigma 0.8.1
body:
Fixes:

* Field name condition tracking only adds processing item to tracking set if transformation does change fields.
* Field name condition matching distinguished for field names and detection items.
* FieldNameProcessingItemAppliedCondition now checks on field name and detection item processing set depends if a field name or detection item is checked.

name: pySigma 0.8.0
body:
* Added field name processing conditions that are also applied to the Sigma rule field name list.
* Breaking change: IncludeFieldCondition and ExcludeFieldCondition are now field name conditions and have to be moved from the `detection_item_conditions` to the new `field_name_conditions` list of a processing item.
* Tracking of applied processing items on field names. Added `FieldNameProcessingItemAppliedCondition` field name condition that checks if a processing item was applied to a field name.

name: pySigma 0.7.3
body:
* Various bugfixes
* Fail on deprecated pipe condition syntax

name: pySigma 0.7.2
body:
* Added field name mapping tracking to ProcessingPipeline.field_mappings
* Added mapping of fields list in Sigma rules

name: pySigma 0.7.1
body: Additional CIDR expression template variables network, netmask and prefixlen.

name: pySigma 0.7.0
body:
# Change details
* Centralized string quoting and decision about it into methods.
* Conditional quoting based on pattern.
* Improved CIDR matching
  * Consolidated logic into less methods.
  * The class attribute cidr_expression defines an expression for native CIDR matching. If this is not present, the CIDR value is expanded into string wildcard matches that are ORed. The existing expression conversion logic is used in this case.

# Breaking changes
* quotes have to be removed from template strings.
* only cidr_expression is supporte as class attribute. For the other values that had to be defined previously, defined in-list expressions are used.

name: pySigma 0.6.8
body: Added parenthesize option to TextQueryBackend.

name: pySigma 0.6.7
body: Fixed: or-linking of multi-field mappings.

name: pySigma 0.6.6
body:
* Added templating to add_condition transformation.
* Added further default Windows log sources.

name: pySigma 0.6.5
body: Added Sigma Windows service identifiers to Windows event log channel name mapping.

name: pySigma 0.6.4
body: Added escaping of field names.

name: pySigma 0.6.3
body:
* Bugfix in conversion of Sigma rules into a dict with numeric values.
* Specific error on tags without namespace.

name: v0.6.2
body:
* Quoting of field names.
* Fixed handling of query expressions.

name: pySigma 0.6.1
body: Fixed handling of empty detections caused by drop detection item transformation.

name: pySigma 0.6.0
body:
* Startswith, endswith, contains and dedicated wildcard match expressions
* Backend output format specific processing pipelines
* New modifier 'windash'
* Fixed precedence of expanding value modifier results
* Processing pipeline state
* SetState transformation

name: pySigma 0.5.2
body: Bugfix (unnecessary *attr* import)

name: pySigma 0.5.1
body: * Additional common log source definitions (moved from Splunk backend)

name: pySigma 0.5.0
body:
* **BREAKING CHANGE:** ConditionFieldValueInExpression was removed. This can break existing backends.
* Moved handling of in-expressions completely into the backend.

name: pySigma 0.4.5
body:
* Extended processing item tracking to rule level.
* Added processing conditions that allow to check if a processing item was applied.
* Added negation of processing conditions.

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/compare/v0.4.4...v0.4.5

name: pySigma 0.4.4
body:
## What's Changed
* fix: do not accept invalid conditions by @gaelmuller in https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/pull/39
* Fix: encoding issue in SigmaCollection.load_ruleset() method in collection.py by @mbabinski in https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/pull/40


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/compare/v0.4.3...v0.4.4

name: pySigma 0.4.3
body:
Bugfixes

## What's Changed
* Fixes: missing of them and unescaped regular expressions by @gaelmuller in https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/pull/37

## New Contributors
* @gaelmuller made their first contribution in https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/pull/37

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/SigmaHQ/pySigma/compare/v0.4.2...v0.4.3

name: pySigma 0.4.2
body:
* Bugfixes
* Common Windows logsource condition generator

name: pySigma 0.4.1
body: Fixed float numer handling.

name: pySigma 0.4.0
body:
* Updated pyparsing and pyyaml to latest major releases.
* Additional rule states according to specification.
* Bugfix

name: pySigma 0.3.2
body: Added common pipeline condition for Windows DNS events.

name: pySigma 0.3.1
body: Import cleanup fixing errors if development dependencies are not installed.

name: v0.3.0
body: Improved error handling. Location of Sigma rules and their subobjects are now tracked and file with error is shown if available in exception.
